An object X rests on a smooth horizontal surface. Two horizontal forces act on X as shown in Fig. 1.1
A force of \(55\mathrm{N}\) is applied to the right. A force of \(18\mathrm{N}\) is applied at an angle of \(115^{\circ}\) to the direction of the \(55\mathrm{N}\) force

The mass of X is \(2.7 \text{kg}\)
Calculate the magnitude of the acceleration of X
acceleration = .........\(\text{m s}^{-2}\)

the change in momentum of A,
